text: The staff is so helpful and knowledgeable. They have any product you can think of and will help you find the perfect one. Highly recommend

name: Brandy Chambers
text: Love this place! It's not just about having a ton of products. It's about knowing your products inside and out and how they affect your wellness. Every person is different and Aleah took the time to ask more questions to find the most beneficial products for me and I couldn't be happier with the experience. I will be back!

name: Debora Veal
text: Have purchased from this shop several times this past month. Each time I have been dismissed and left standing when other customers come in. Just because I'm coming by after work does mean I don't deserve respect as a customer. I always pay cash as well. I will be traveling out of Cullman and my money will be going with me or ordering online in the future.

name: Sherie Lightsey
text: I was so excited to see the store I could not believe it, here in Gardendale no no way. I love the vibe of the store. You don't see tattoos getting done or piercing what they do it is actually a comfortable place to be. Alex was so kind and patient because I needed to learn about what they sold, what was best for what I did not even know about the vapor thingy and I am so happy that I bought one it even has Rick and Morty on it. Alex was a great teacher, the store has a good feel. I worry about the future of us being able to use marijuana, once the religious, elite Republicans find out and the hypocrisy of their attitude towards a plant and the financial boom they get to improve our education so we don't have to be 50 out of 50 in education. Everyone who is benefiting from their products, who get relief from a long list of ailments should be prepared to stand up for this store and make sure they don't try to shut them down, our voices should be heard if this ever happens. I am sending love to all who work there and help so many.

name: Mark Vines
text: I was the female with anxiety who came in today. I want to tell you thank you  SO SO much for your help today. I already feel a LOT better. Good luck with your grandma! ❤️❤️😘😘

name: Sean Smith
text: 10/10 highly recommend for all Cbd and delta 8 needs.

name: Gabe Fitzwater
text: Super knowledgeable and friendly staff. Best prices in town and best selection hands down. Needless to say, I’ll be a repeat customer for life! 🙌

name: Anthony Logan
text: Awesome guys working there. Good products and they know what they are talking about fr.

name: Olivia Bryant
text:
What a great place! Knowledgable budtenders with fantastic attitudes, warm and clean facility.
This is our favorite CBD store!

name: Cooper Vajner
text: The owner is extremely knowledgable and very informative about the products he sells. He seems very focused on helping every potential customer that walks in the door. Great experience and I will be back! Highly recommend

name: R K Russell
text:
Amazing!  This is a much needed store for hemp based products. The owner is knowledgeable & kind, offering info for new users as well as "old timers".
This is a must check it out!

name: Floy Spera
text: I Love this store. They are very helpful excellent customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: R3Tr0 Max
text: I was one of the lucky first customers to enter this store, I got along well with the owner who serves his customers in a very good way and the young man is very well informed about the subject of CBD, the disposition he has when showing you his products and the information that guarantees you about it is incredible, a very good place to learn about the world of CBD and the good factors that it brings with it.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Max!! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Mrs. Crystal Faulkner
text: Doing my happy dance! 🤩

name: Ryan Kendrick
text:
Great quality and selection of flower! Indica and Sativa strains! This place came by surprise to a Mount Olive native who knows of the overwhelming religious presence in the City of Gardendale and their allowances. I also know that Healthy Harvest CBD will turn a lot of heads, help a lot of lives, and change a lot of hearts for the better. God has mercifully granted us with Cannabis which is such an amazing medicinal solution to, quite frankly, numerous ailments. The tingle in the smoke even clears my stopped-up or runny nose haha! Why would someone not even consider leaving man-made OTC meds or even talk to their doctor about lessening their prescription with cannabis (depending on the ailment, obviously).
Very knowledgeable and personable owner! Thanks Ocean!

resp.text: Wow Thank you so much!!!! We appreciate you touching on the subject of religion, we have noticed many people involved in the Gardendale and surrounding churches finding relief and we can only thank God for that! Well said!!! The holistic approach to health and well being is almost always better in our humble opinion, just the way God intended! Thank you!!!

name: Ashton Reed
text: Amazing place! Great customer service and has an amazing selection.

name: Jacquelyn Jones
text: Very nice place

name: Chris Riseling
text: I had the opportunity to visit Healthy Harvest CBD a couple days ago, not really knowing what to expect.  Possibly another vape shop selling tons of vape juices and a handful of overpriced CBD products in glitzy packaging (promising to cure me of everything), with someone behind the counter who’s more concerned with their phone and the latest Twitter trend.  Thankfully, this was not the case. What I found, after spending the better part of 30 minutes getting to know the owner, was a shop dedicated to one thing only: CDB. The owner’s professionalism and knowledge of the products he sells are some of the best I've come across. If you've been using CBD products for a while, starting out, or even just wanting more information on the benefits of CBD, you'll be doing yourself a huge service by skipping the vape stores and gas stations around town and going to this place first!

resp.text: Wow, thank you SO MUCH, Chris! This is very humbling, and another reminder of why we do this!!! We’re committed to learning all we can so we can educate and help others! Thank you so much!!!

name: Alex Cornelius
text: Bought some gummies from Healthy Harvest CBD. It tasted like I was just eating green apple flavored gummies lol. Overall was very relaxed and able to get what I needed to do done with no anxiety.

resp.text: Thanks for this review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Nick J
text: Got a vape got a pre roll. Come check them out

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Aaron Jacobs
text: They are very friendly and helpful.

name: Lori Beyard
text:
Seaborn was so very helpful with my questions when I called before going up to the shop (which is super nice by the way). Based on the information he was able to relay to me and his ability to ease my worries on product quality, I immediately headed that way. Both he and the clerk working were just as wonderful and helpful in person. I haven't used the product long enough yet but I'm sure it will be great after finding out about the quality control they have and the fact that their product is organically grown. Thank you guys!

EDIT: I have since had a chance to try their Delta 8 product. His formula and it being clean and organic makes it extra special. Helped with my pain level exponentially.  Highly recommend this shop. And they will answer and and all questions you may have. Wide range of CBD products besides Delta 8. Soaps and creams too. Wonderful experience!!

name: John Lott
text: We have been to Denver, and other multiple dispensories, Well Rooted is by far the best. Knowledgable, courteous. Great to tell my testimonoy and hear how CBD is healing people. Thank you for helping people live fruitfull lives.

name: Travis Tew
text: Top quality products and great selection!  Very friendly and knowledgeable staff!!  Highly recommend for all your CBD products!

resp.text: Thanks for coming in Travis!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Jeff Atkins
text: High prices. Products are good. Lady there said she was guessing on what product to recommend.

resp.text: Good Morning Jeff!  Thank you for your business!  We try our very best to recommend a product that is appropriate to each customer.  Sense we are all react differently to natural remedies,  sometimes our suggestion is simply taking our best guess at what might work best for you.  We pride ourselves in having the best pricing in town when it comes to high quality products & we hope you are having great results & we hope to see you again soon!

name: joyce lewis
text: I’m so forever grateful for you guys at Well Rooted. I had to stay in Dothan for about 6 months with my dad while he was sick. My brother introduced me to these guys and it really help stimulate my mind. I started giving my dad a smoke of the Sour Space candy CBD at night, and eventually his kidneys started working over time. My left knee is healed, I no longer need a cane to walk with. My dad ended up passing away the last Saturday in, September of 2020. I’m back home in, Jacksonville and will forever remember you guys.

name: Dawn Finch
text: Really friendly and knowledgeable. Wonderful products and cute store.

name: Rob Harrell
text: Really cool little shop!  Very relaxing atmosphere with friendly and well informed customer service!  Different from all the other pop up CBD stores.  This place is legit and truly dedicated to enriching the lives of their customers. There is also cool, unique art and furniture for sale. I use the soaps and gummies isolate. Great natural way to take the edge off. They truly have something for everyone!

name: Grayson Wood
text:
Well Rooted has a warm and friendly atmosphere. The customer service is attentive and informative. They have a lot of unique art created by local artists. They also have vintage furniture. I have seen something new every time I go. They have a wide array of CBD products to choose from as well.

I got a small cool sculpture for my coffee table and a vinyl. The CBD products I have gotten from them met all of my expectations, excellent quality.

name: Pamela Hallford
text: The shop is just the cutest thing with awesome artwork, home decor items and vintage furniture! They have something for everyone with the friendliest staff in town.  Love it!

name: Jeffrey Ray
text: This is the #1 place for Delta 8

name: Heather Peoples Wood
text: Love this little shop. Quality CBD and the unique storefront is just so much fun.  Staff is very helpful and warm. Only place I plan to purchase my cbd!

name: brandesha potter
text: Very knowledgeable about thier product and all staff extremely friendly and helpful!! Definitely a repeat customer!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We are glad we could help and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Jessica Givens
text: We bought some of the lavender CBD cream and have been loving the results. Great atmosphere and very helpful staff. We love Well Rooted!

name: Megan Hopkins
text: Not only is this the cutest store, but the owners and staff are very helpful and wonderful people! We are so glad we have such a well-informed CBD store to help answer any questions!

name: no one
text: Totally cute with local artists work and fresh cbd flower and oils. Friendly staff and vintage womens clothing

name: Amanda Kay Whiddon
text: Amazing CBD store!  The store's decor and atmosphere is simply breathtaking.  Peaceful and serene.   The store manager was very helpful, knowledgeable and thoughtful.  Not only do they have top quality CBD products but they are also the hub for local artists to showcase and sell their crafts.  The best smelling candles from a locally owned business are readily available to sample and you can even bring in your grandmother's favorite piece of crystal  or whatnot and they will make it into a one of a kind candle for you!  Music on vinyl from local musicians, artwork from local professional and little amateurs who are surely on their way to becoming pros in the future!  Where can you find that perfect vintage Coach bag?  Yes...right here.  Perhaps the Best Rooted place in Dothan in my opinion.  10 stars!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in and for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Kim Nunley
text: The customer service was amazing

name: Dennis Estes
text:
Weird Science done right!!!

Love Diana and Neil Ide.

Dennis- Bama-Bio Tech...

name: Jason Kohn
text: Amazing CBD products. Very knowledgeable Staff, and great buying experience. They make you feel welcome to the store. And answer any questions you may have,and help you decide what best fits your lifestyle. Overall highly recommend this Local store.

resp.text: Thanks, Jason. Great to get to know you

name: Travis M
text: Hands down one of the better dispensary experiences I've had since living here. The staff completely understands and levels with the customers and makes the whole process way more personal than other places. Thanks so much for hemp-helpfully helping me get  relief I need!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: zach rowland
text: Great guys here!!! They really are well Informed on all stuff CBD!!!!

name: Macy Walden
text: Aaron was amazing. He knew what he was talking about when showing me different strands of hemp and he even gave me samples to try that just came in and are strong. Great guy.

resp.text: Thanks!!

name: Kevin Ives
text: Awesome experience.  The customer service and expert knowledge of their products helped me choose what I was looking for.  I highly recommend this business to others and I will be returning for future purchases.

resp.text: Wow! Thanks, Kevin

name: Chandler Breal
text: Great experience, very nice people that work there. And some seriously amazing products!

resp.text: Thx!

name: Laura Delmarsh
text:
The impeccable customer service paired with expert knowledge provided an excellent experience when searching for the proper product.
I highly recommend Simply CBD for not only their extensive inventory of product, but for attentive service focused on you and your individual needs.

name: Adam Hamilton
text: My wife and I had an excellent experience at Simply CBD today.  Chad and Aaron were very helpful and knowledgeable.  They were able to recommend a tincture and chews for our dog who has seizures and tremors, as well as, a tincture for the bursitis in my shoulder.  The quality control practiced in production of the products is impeccable.  You can even see the individual lab results for each product.

resp.text: Thanks, Adam. So nice to meet you both.

name: Lilith Knight
text: There's a pretty good variety but probably the best quality I've seen in Southern Alabama.

name: Josh Holliday
text: I have been shopping at Simply CBD in Daphne for a couple of months now. The quality of the product line is incredible. High quality CBD products! The staff is highly knowledgeable about the science and applications of each of their products. I highly recommend Simply CBD!

resp.text: Thanks, Josh!

name: Jakob Johnson
text: Great selection, great service, and great prices! Aaron is very knowledgeable on CBD products and is committed to helping you make an informed purchase. I highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thanks for high praise, Jakob. We appreciate you.

name: Aaron VanHauter
text: So I stopped in because I keep hearing about Delta-8. I was in another store down the road and they just kept trying to push it and couldn't give me info about it, so I left went down the road and Simply spent 20 min going over what the Delta-8 is, what I should expect and how to take it. If knowing what you put in your body is important then go check them out

name: Molly Armstrong
text: Great staff and amazing prices!!

resp.text: Thanks, Molly. Hope everything works well for you!

name: Kendall Pledger
text: Best CBD store I've been to. Always greeted with a smiling (now masked) face💗 Me and my husband couldn't think of any better way to spend our money than on these products. True relief and relaxation to the deepest pain 💙

name: Melody Duncan
text: Aaron is super kind and knowledgeable about the products offered in store—-also, there is an array of natural skin care products available, not just CBD products!

resp.text: Thanks, Melody. Always great to see you. Good energy!

name: Shermeka Brandon
text: A great store to go too I love it I will be going back

name: Karen Barkle
text: The people are so very knowledgeable. They have answered every question I have come up with. They give great advice for what ails us and are very friendly. Great service, great products!

name: Milissa Guitterrez
text: Aaron and Chad are extremely knowledgeable. As I have engaged in conversations with several CBD business owners, it is clear that they stand head and shoulders above! They are careful to ask multiple questions in an effort to truly solve the problem at hand. In asking questions and receiving answers to those questions, it’s evident that they have researched and provided some of the best products out there. They do a great job in educating!

name: Robin Ponder
text: Awesome store. These guys know their products, are friendly and helpful and offer great suggestions but are not pushy. They are the real deal. Dont mess around with those other stores

name: Steve Avery
text: Okay, so there a few places in the area I visited in Fairhope and Daphne. Simply CBD is on a whole nother level. Aaron took the time to explain every product they had and what it can help with. I had no idea there were other cananbanoids other than CBD. He also made sure I knew how much to take so I would not waste or undertake. If you are going to try CBD, you need to go here.

resp.text: Thanks, Steve. We are always eager to teach those who want to learn.

name: Laura Leigh
text: We are so pleased with the products and services at Simply CBD. Our sweet Pup suffers from epilepsy and they have been so helpful in helping us find the product for him. If you have questions about CBD and it's benefits please go see them. You will not be disappointed.

name: Dana Walker
text: I was referred by my Dr at Thomas Hospital to try CBD and he said these guys know the most in the area.I have severe fibromyalgia. I can't say he was wrong. Aaron spent about 30 min with me going over everything. I walked out with the pain cream. It works in about 10 min for me. Very happy I stopped in. I recommend.

resp.text: Thanks, Dana. I'm glad you had a good experience.

name: Frank & Shamona parler
text:
Ripping teenagers off!
My 15 year old daughter decided to get her screen fixed on her own with her own money. She only had $80.00. The vape shop charged her $59.99 to repair her screen and it only took 30 minuets. He repaired her screen, but when she attempted to make a call. Her speaker or camera wasn’t working. My son went back up there to only receive the message that it would cost another $49.99 to repair. I called up there and asked him why would he take her money and not correctly fix her phone causing more problems than before. The man went on stating he didn’t break her speaker but the person prior to him who fixed her phone damaged her speaker and camera. Now prior to him fixing my daughters phone, my son fixed her screen 8months ago and everything worked fine. I relayed this information to him in hopes of him reopening her phone to find the problem. He again stated, he will not. It will cost another $49.99. I asked for the manager. He replied he’s the owner. I said so your not gonna do anything about not fixing my daughters phone correctly. He said no. Unless you pay $49.99, there’s nothing else I can do. I said sir, do you know you just crushed a 15 year old lil girls heart who tried to do the right thing on her own? As to what I thought, he gave No reply. I will never enter this store again!

resp.text: Dear customer, your daughter came with a broken screen and said she wants to fix, and that is what we did. We replaced her screen with a brand new screen. Like you mentioned and like we told you, someone already tried to fix the phone before and they cut off the camera wire. Therefore, its not working. The camera replacement is different from the screen replacement. Thank you.

name: Anna Franks
text:
Very Impressive CannaBama!!
If you are looking for an experienced CBD store with fantastic quality of customer service and a welcoming atmosphere this is absolutely positively the place to go!! Wish I could rate it a million stars!!
Now, I must say Isaiah is totally on his game!! Although I arrived shortly before closing yesterday just knowing as I was full of questions as well as many concerns and I more than likely wasn't going to get much information and was probably going to be rushed out the door because we all know how it is when have been at work all day, we are tired and want to go home. However Isaiah was as nice as he could be and very much informative. There was not one question (trust me I was full of them) where he didn't have an answer nor give me that dumbfounded look as if I should have known the answer before I even asked. He took the time to explain to me in detail of each and every single question and concerns I had. (Other CBD stores I have went into in the past I was treated right the opposite as they tried pushing their products on me and not even really knowing much about the products. Needless to say I didn't purchase anything from them.) Isaiah not once tried pushing anything on me at all. He simply answered all the questions I had showed me the products as he explained each one to me. name: Liz Bozeman
text:
TRDL; if you don't want to read entire review:
if you need to go to a liquor store. DONT GO TO ABC OR ABC SPIRITS or whatever that place is called - thats on 231. I mean its good but so far NO liquor store has compared to this one. Just come here. TRUST. ME.

Full Review:
I just went here for the first time today. As in just left. I loved this place SO SO SO MUCH. I was telling myself I must do a review as soon as I get home. What this place has to offer is so much! I just bought soju from there! And it was not terribly price. The only place I could find it was at a Korean restaurant (that was called Kalim Garden. And I would buy unopened bottles from them. I also got 2 different bottles of sake. Which I couldn't be more happy about! There is White Claw here. They still have it in stock despite the fact that there is currently a shortage. The guy inside (I didn't get his name was so friendly. This is also a place you can get CBD & vape products. I actually bought a pack of prerolles hempettes. It looked like they have 4 brands to choose from. I have tried a lot of the hempette brands and listen to me!! - just buy the red pack. Stunna Bubba Kush. I have tried the other ones pure hemp is pretty good but there are a lot stems in it even tho they claim theres not, wild hemp brand is just...really tame. Flavor is worst than the "Pure Hemp" brand. So that's usually just what ive been forced to get around here. HOWEVER I am currently smoking one of these Stunnas. The flavor - very good. Would rate 4/5 bc its good but it is def no premium ish. Stem wise give a 3/5 I'm hearing tons of little pops.... But nothing like the Pure Hemp brand. Price I give 5/5 stars. This one was $13.99 I think. The other brands I have mentioned were $9.99. Which is typical but very decently priced compared to other hemp shops ive been to. So just pay the extra $4 for the red one if you are interested.

Also as for how the store looks and atmosphere wise - AMAZING. hate that google is a 5 star system bcuz that for sure is a 10 star - no 11 stars for the atmosphere of the place. Employee also seems to be very knowledgeable although I didnt have to ask many questions bc I knew what I was going for and know my alcohol. But they had things in there I have never tried before. So that excited me a lot.

I will be putting the TLDR at the top of my review as well in case no one reads this novella of a review. 😂 but if you need to go to a liquor store. DONT GO TO ABC OR ABC SPIRITS or whatever that place is called - thats on 231. I mean its good but so far NO liquor store has compared to this one. Just come here. TRUST. ME.

You will receive 10% off your flower purchase and if you bring back a green tube from a previous pre-roll purchase, you will receive another 5% off. Come in and try our new Alabama Red!
